description.en: The data displayed above is part of a broader dataset on COVID-19 cases, which includes data on new cases, imported cases, active cases, and recoveries. Breakdowns by age and vaccination status are also available.
description.bm: Data yang dipaparkan di atas adalah sebahagian daripada dataset tentang kes COVID-19, yang merangkumi data kes baru, kes import, kes aktif, dan kes sembuh. Pecahan mengikut kumpulan umur dan status vaksinasi juga terkandung dalam set data ini.

variables.name: cases_new
variables.desc_en: [Integer] The number of new COVID-19 cases recorded for the time period, including reinfections.
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] Jumlah kes baharu COVID-19 bagi tempoh yang diperincikan, termasuk jangkitan semula.

variables.name: cases_import
variables.desc_en: [Integer] The number of new COVID-19 cases arriving in Malaysia from overseas recorded for the time period.
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] Jumlah kes baharu COVID-19 yang datang dari luar negara bagi tempoh yang diperincikan.

variables.name: cases_active
variables.desc_en: [Integer] The number of active COVID-19 cases for the time period. i.e. individuals currently positive who have not recovered or passed away
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] Jumlah kes aktif COVID-19 bagi tempoh yang diperincikan, iaitu jumlah individu yang kini dijangkiti yang belum sembuh atau meninggal dunia.

variables.name: cases_recovered
variables.desc_en: [Integer] The number of individuals who recovered from COVID-19 for the time period.
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] Jumlah individu yang sembuh daripada jangkitan COVID-19 bagi tempoh yang diperincikan.

variables.name: cases_unvax
variables.desc_en: [Integer] The number of unvaccinated individuals newly-infected with COVID-19 for the time period, including reinfections.
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] Jumlah individu tidak divaksinasi yang baru dijangkiti COVID-19 bagi tempoh yang diperincikan, termasuk jangkitan semula.

variables.name: cases_pvax
variables.desc_en: [Integer] The number of partially vaccinated individuals newly-infected with COVID-19 for the time period, including reinfections.
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] Jumlah individu tidak lengkap divaksinasi yang baru dijangkiti COVID-19 bagi tempoh yang diperincikan, termasuk jangkitan semula.

variables.name: cases_fvax
variables.desc_en: [Integer] The number of fully vaccinated individuals newly-infected with COVID-19 for the time period, including reinfections.
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] Jumlah individu lengkap vaksinasi yang baru dijangkiti COVID-19 bagi tempoh yang diperincikan, termasuk jangkitan semula.

variables.name: cases_unvax
variables.desc_en: [Integer] The number of boosted individuals newly-infected with COVID-19 for the time period, including reinfections.
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] Jumlah individu lengkap dos penggalak yang baru dijangkiti COVID-19 bagi tempoh yang diperincikan, termasuk jangkitan semula.
